member.name: T:DcsConverter.DcsAll
member.summary: This class performs actions that involve DCS_CSV, DCS_JSON, and DCS_XML

member.name: M:DcsConverter.DcsAll.ParseFile(System.String)
member.summary: This function will parse a data file.
member.param: The full file name of the file to parse.

member.name: M:DcsConverter.DcsAll.OutputFile(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: This function will take in a dynamic object and output a specified file type.
member.param: The full path of the new save file.
The parsed content to be output to file.

member.name: M:DcsConverter.DcsAll.ObjToDataTable(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts a dynamic object of parsed data into a datatable
member.param: The dynamic parsed data
member.returns: A datatable containing the parsed data

member.name: T:DcsConverter.DcsCsv
member.summary: This class will perform all operations related to CSV files.

member.name: M:DcsConverter.DcsCsv.ParseCsv(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a JSON file and parses it to a dynamic object.
member.param: The FULL path of the CSV file to convert.
member.returns: A dynamic object, representing the CSV file. A row from the dynamic object is obtained by calling "rowxcoly" where "x" is the number of the row starting at 0 and y is the number of the column starting at 0.

member.name: M:DcsConverter.DcsCsv.parseCSV_AsJsonArray(System.String)
member.summary: This parses the data in JSON array form. Details are shown at http://www.convertcsv.com/csv-to-json.htm
member.param: The FULL path of the CSV file to convert.
member.returns: A dynamic object, representing the CSV file.

member.name: M:DcsConverter.DcsCsv.OutputCsv(System.Object,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a C# object to a CSV file. See http://www.codeproject.com/Tips/565920/Create-CSV-from-JSON-in-Csharp for implementation data. This article, along with any associated source code and files, is licensed under The Code Project Open License (CPOL).
member.param: The object to write to file.
The FULL path of the file to write.
Whether or not the CSV data contains a header. True by default.
A specified delimeter to seperate the values. Comma by default.
The specified character encoding. UTF8 by default.

member.name: T:DcsConverter.Extensions
member.summary: Extensions class for outputCSV

member.name: M:DcsConverter.Extensions.ToMyCsv(System.Data.DataTable,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: A CSV creator based on http://www.codeproject.com/Tips/565920/Create-CSV-from-JSON-in-Csharp. This article, along with any associated source code and files, is licensed under The Code Project Open License (CPOL)
member.param: data table
delimiter
Whether or not the CSV data contains a header. True by default.

member.name: T:DcsConverter.DcsJson
member.summary: This class is used for all JSON related conversion within DCS_Converter

member.name: M:DcsConverter.DcsJson.ParseJson(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a JSON file and parses it to a dynamic object.
member.param: The FULL path of the JSON file to convert.
member.returns: A dynamic object, representing the JSON file.

member.name: M:DcsConverter.DcsJson.OutputJson(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Writes a C# object to a JSON file.
member.param: The object to write to file.
The FULL path of the file to write.
The date format. ISO by default.
Whether or not to strip indents. False by default.
Whether or not to strip null values. True by default.
Whether or not to strip non-ascii values. False by default.

member.name: T:DcsConverter.DcsXml
member.summary: This class is used for all XML related conversion within DCS_Converter

member.name: M:DcsConverter.DcsXml.ParseXml(System.String)
member.summary: Loads an XML file and converts it to a C# object.
member.param: The FULL path of the file to convert.
member.returns: A dynamic object, representing the XML file.

member.name: M:DcsConverter.DcsXml.ParseXmlData(System.String)
member.summary: Loads XML content and converts it to a C# object.
member.param: A string containing the XML content to be parsed.
member.returns: A dynamic object, representing the XML file.

member.name: M:DcsConverter.DcsXml.OutputXml(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Writes a C# object to an XML file. If there are multiple root nodes in the object, a ROOT node will be written to surround the file.
member.param: The object to write to file.
The FULL path of the file to write.
Name of the root node. "ROOT" by default.
Boolean option to strip indentation whitespace in the file. False by default
Boolean option to strip newline whitespace in the file. False by default
Boolean option to strip the xml declaration header in the file. True by default

member.name: T:DcsConverter.DataTableExtensions
member.summary: A class containing extensions to assist in displaying parsed data in a datatable.

member.name: M:DcsConverter.DataTableExtensions.ToCsv(System.Data.DataTable,System.String)
member.summary: Takes in a datatable as input, and outputs a CSV file.
member.param: The table to be converted to CSV.
The delimeter used in the CSV file.
